code: import'./App.css';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Button,Card,CardContent,Link,TextField,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{Link as RouterLink,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RegistrationPage(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{console.log("Username:",username);},[username]);const handleRegister=async()=>{setError('');try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/register",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({username,email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){alert("Registration successful!");navigate("/");}else{setError(data.message||"Registration failed");}}catch(error){console.error("Registration error:",error);setError("Server error.
